headline.main: RUSSIANS CONTINUE ADVANCE IN CENTER; Gain 9 to 11 Miles in Offensive for Mogilev and Gomel -- Score in Kuban Area RUSSIANS CONTINUE ADVANCE IN CENTER RUSSIANS GAIN ON CENTRAL FRONT AND IN CAUCASUS

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Sunday, Oct. 3 -- Battling mounting German resistance in White Russia, Soviet divisions smashed through roadless forests and swamps toward the upper Dnieper and Vitebsk yesterday, while 700 miles to the south the Red Army was slowly squeezing the Nazis from their last foothold in the Caucasus, Moscow said today.
abstract: USSR forces continue gains, Mogilev and Gomel drives; Gers launch 6 counter-attacks to protect Mogilev approaches; rept 12 USSR divs attack in Zaporozhye area in attempt to cut off Crimea; USSR forces take Starotitarovskaya on Taman Peninsula; map
